entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
